Title: Relates to the application of certain provisions relating to the operating component of rates of payment made by governmental agencies for certain services
Summary: Relates to the application of certain provisions relating to the operating component of rates of payment made by governmental agencies for facilities that provide extensive nursing, medical, psychological and counseling support services solely to children.
LawCode: Amd ยง2808, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to the application of certain provisions relating to the operating component of rates of payment made by governmental agencies for certain services
